message:
شباب محتاج طريقه أعرف اوصل بيها للايميل بتاع مستخدمي تويتر
أنا عملتها في ابلكيشن الفيسبوك عن طريق الجافا اسكربت
و دورت بصراحة كتير عن طريق جوجل اني ألاقي حد جاب الطريقه اني اوصل بيها لايميل بتاع مستخدم التويتر و ملقتش حاجه
حد عنده خلفيه الموضوع ينفع اصلاً زي الفيسبوك ولا لا ؟؟

data.message:
The API won't return an email address to you. If you're interested in a user's email address, you'll have to ask the user for it within your own application as a completely distinct act. 
https://dev.twitter.com/discussions/4019
+1 to Eslam. This is how it used to be for very long time. I had an application completely built around emails, allows users to automate sending tweets to lists of emails.

We show a notification to the user once logged in (in the app) to tell them the value of adding their email (in this case we set the emails as reply-to addresses to the emails we send). Your app may do it differently, so for example may make it part of the registration process.
Can i have a sample Mohamed Meligy ??
